descriptionHtml:
【[size=4]D[/size][size=4]escription[/size]】
I added a new male follower Kris in Blue palace,and he can use Destruction spells and healing spell. 
he Immunes paralysis and strong unrelenting force.
I customize his armors,But you can change other clothes for him
Thank you for your playing! 
His armor comes from [url=http://9204honeybee.tistory.com/2][color=#ff0000]9204 BDO Pack by Team TAL (9204, ReGenBot03,Pearl, Dovahking) [/color][/url]Thanks for all you hard work.
Please do NOT redistribute this Mod,Thank you!
[color=#ff0000][b]If you like him [/b]
[b]ENDORSE please![/b][/color][b] Thank you![/b]

[size=4][How to install]
1: Download the file
2: Install the file in the NMM and MO
3: Enable the ESP

【Character】[/size]
Name :Kris
Weight : 50
Height : 1.00
Combat Style : Destruction and Healing Spells
Inventory : BDO Gavi Regan
Skills : Destruction and Healing Spells And Customized ability
Level : 20-999
Location : Blue palace
Marriage：Yes

[size=4]【Recommend】[/size]
